heading: HR00138
0: A RESOLUTION CALLING FOR THE PHILIPPINE DRUG ENFORCEMENT AGENCY (PDEA) TO INTENSIFY CRACK DOWN OPERATIONS ON ILLEGAL DRUGS TRADE IN METRO MANILA IN ORDER TO CURB THE PERPETRATION OF HEINOUS CRIMES THEREIN

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00138
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION CALLING FOR THE PHILIPPINE DRUG ENFORCEMENT AGENCY (PDEA) TO INTENSIFY CRACK DOWN OPERATIONS ON ILLEGAL DRUGS TRADE IN METRO MANILA IN ORDER TO CURB THE PERPETRATION OF HEINOUS CRIMES THEREIN
